WorkItem.Description:
I've noticed that the DPSWarr module Optimizer from a couple of versions back to now has degraded in speed drastically. It now take more than 2 hours (in a full thorough optimizer setting) to optimize my gear, even though I don't have that much gear, but worst, and what is killing me, is trying to build an upgrade list, which I had to stop after 1 day and half, when it still was at 50% more or less. Comparing that with the ProtWarr module, where it takes around 2-5 minutes to optimize my gear (which I have a lot) in a full thorough optimizer setting, and around 2 hours to build the upgrade list ... the difference is humongous. 
Â 
Have you seen this issue happening?

Comments.Message: Refer to http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/18086 - the issue is fixed in the latest source code, and will be included in the forthcoming v2.3.21 release.  As it's an issue marked "Fixed" (hidden under the default viewing options), you don't get any reprimand from us.  =D
